channel.title: Cant login MoparScape 3.2 w/Aryan
channel.description:
New to this rsps stuff and just wanted to play around on it a bit to see how it is, but keep getting this massage in bottom. Also attached a screenie of the problem.
Server: hybridscape Server (2): Exception! Server: ClientHandler: Client the_best disconnected. [04:03:12] Couldn't open output stream to log file the best-20121116.log [04:03:12] [04:03:12] Logging into (the best, *****) [04:03:12] Your UID is: 18166546 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:50835 Did not save for the_best Server: ClientHandler: Client the_best disconnected.
[img]http://i1257.photobucket.com/albums/ii515/monkey84712/moparfail.png[/img]

item.title: Cant login MoparScape 3.2 w/Aryan
item.dc:creator: @Jengho Jengho
item.description:
@Jengho wrote:

ohza well whats the latest moparscape? i saw one about 4.2 but couldnt find a download for it. only webclient

Read full topic

item.title: Cant login MoparScape 3.2 w/Aryan
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

127.0.0.1 connects to your own computer. Most servers now-a-days are not compatible with the Moparscape client. A lot of the servers now have their own content unique to their server loading through their own cache. Its very rare to find a server working with this client anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Cant login MoparScape 3.2 w/Aryan
item.dc:creator: @Jengho Jengho
item.description:
@Jengho wrote:

I feel like i havnt explained my situation clearly. Ohk i am trying to play offline and when it says like “create your own username and password, and start playing” after clicking start server, or some shit like that I entered a random ass usrname and password, and it didnt work lol. Is there a certain ip i need to put in to play offline or register an account? Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Cant login MoparScape 3.2 w/Aryan
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Jengho:

What do you mean lol? as i said im new. what do you mean by source, and own client?

In the download section you can find sources released by people, most of them have a compatible client with it,
I suggest you follow the how to start a server tutorial in the tutorials section. (it’s stickied)

Read full topic

item.title: Cant login MoparScape 3.2 w/Aryan
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Your source is probably not compatible with the moparscape client, I suggest downloading a source that has it’s own client with it.

Read full topic
